result.execSummary:
The defendant Harvey E. Myers Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Harvey E. Myers Jr.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: #1- pipe - marked  #2 - THC - marked #3 - bowls and pipe - marked - nothing offered

Defendant, Harvey E. Myers appeared.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called appearances given  No victim right issues.  Court goes over some preliminary matters.  State addresses the motion to amend the criminary complaint.  Court addresses the motion.  Deft does not object the motion filed by the State.  Court grants the motion amending the date on the complaint.  Preliminary jury instructions are handed out to the parties.  Court goes over the process of a jury trial with the deft due to his being pro se.  State and defense is not requesting sequestration  No good child motion is necessary.  State not going to use any statements given. Case recalled after the jurors are brought in. Jury selection @ 9:20 am. Completed @ 10:15 am.  Back on the record at 10:30 am.

Deft asks the court the if the sister can talk for him.  The court informs the deft that she will not be able to do that.  Jurors are brought into the courtroom at 10:35 am.  Court gives the jurors the preliminary  jury instructions.  Opening statements at 10:45am  Completed at 10:49 am. Notepads are handed out to the jurors.  Malarie A Borth  duly sworn and testifies. Id'd deft in the courtroom.  Jared Parr  duly sworn and testifies. Id'd the deft in the courtroom.  Three exhibits are marked and published to the jury.  All  jurors have reviewed exhibits 1-3. Thomas Barker  duly sworn and testifies.  Brian Kingsley  duly sworn and testifies.  Katie Hoffneyer  duly sworn and testifies.  State rests at 11:23 am Jurors are excused at 11:24 am  Court advises the deft of his right to testify. Court finds that the deft is going to testify at the trial.  FVI.  Jurors back in the courtroom at 11:30 am.  Defense calls Amy Myers  duly sworn and testifies.  Deft Harvey E Myers JR   duly sworn and testifies. Jared Parr is recalled to testify.  Evidence is in.  Court excuses the jurors for lunch at 11:48 am.  Return to court at 1:15 am.  Court has rough draft of the jury instruction for the parties to review.

Back on the record at 1:07 pm.  Juror are back at 1:14 pm  Court to read jury instructions Closing arguements State 1:27 pm. defense closing 1:34 pm  Court reads the remaining jury instructions.  Reading of the instructions are complete and jurors excused at 1:41 pm to deliberate.

Verdict reached Back on the record at at 2:09 pm  Jurors back in the courtroom at 2:10 pm.  405 is the floorperson.  Verdicts were given to the bailiff.  Court reads the verdicts on the two count.

Count 1: guilty
Count 2: guilty

Jury to be polled.

Court moves to sentence the deft.

Court orders: - both counts
12 months probation w/held 
Court Costs and any applicable assessments, fees and surcharges due the court.
AODA assessment and treatment
to amend the criminal complaint - state
Jury trial on October 17, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Court advises as to the rights of an attorney - FVI

Defendant Harvey E. Myers not in court.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called appearances given.  Deft does not appear.  State requests a bench warrant and leave the trial on.  Case recalled at 3:34 pm.  Court will not issue the warrant.  Status of Jury Trial.  The deft is prepare to proceed to the Jury Trial.  Bond is reinstated.
Jury trial on October 17, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on October 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Harvey E. Myers Jr.
Current: 303 E 1st St, Merrill, WI 54452 United States  (Effective: 06-15-2016)
Prior: 1909 E Main Street 2, Merrill, WI 54452
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on June 30, 2016 at 08:55 am.

Defendant, Harvey E. Myers appeared.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called appearances given.  Complaint not read to the deft.  Attorney rights advised.  Not guilty plea entered Bond set  Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for June 30, 2016 at 08:55 am.
